original_text: I will become so angry that I punish them very much. I will destroy them like a hot fire. It will be like a fire that reaches deep down into the place of dead people. It will destroy the ground and everything that grows on it. It will burn deep down to the foundations of the mountains. I will become so angry that I punish them very much. I will destroy them like a hot fire. It will be like a fire that reaches deep down into the place of dead people. It will destroy the ground and everything that grows on it. It will burn deep down to the foundations of the mountains. I will become so angry that I punish them very much.
korean_text: 그러므로 내 분노의 불이 일어나서 스올의 깊은 곳까지 불사르며 땅과 그 소산을 삼키며 산들의 터도 불타게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: I will become so angry
that I punish them very much
I will destroy them like a hot fire
It will be like a fire
that reaches deep down
into the place of dead people
It will destroy the ground
and everything that grows on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위에 자라는 모든 것을
